channelml.meta:notes: ChannelML file describing a single synaptic mechanism

synapse_type.name: Syn_Elect_nRT_nRT
synapse_type.meta:notes: Electrical synapse with scaling constant c = 1 nS (translating to conductance of 1e-06 mS). Automatically generated by command: genSyn.py Syn_Elect_nRT_nRT -1 1 -1
